coreAttributes.name: striped bra
coreAttributes.description: A cotton bikini-style bra, designed to match with a pair of striped panties..

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the bra over [npc.her] chest before tying up the strings at [npc.her] back.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the bra over [npc2.namePos] chest before tying up the strings at [npc2.her] back.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the bra over [npc2.namePos] chest before roughly tying up the strings at [npc2.her] back.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the strings of [npc.her] bra and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the strings of [npc2.namePos] bra and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the strings of [npc2.namePos] bra and [npc.verb(pull)] it off.
